mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
SELECT LPAD(MEMBER_CODE, 5, '0') AS MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_DATE, HOLD_POINT FROM MEMBERS ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(MEMBER_CODE)
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS ( MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_DATE, HOLD_POINT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(MEMBER_CODE)),0)+1 FROM MEMBERS), #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNumber}, SYSDATE, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName} AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName} AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname} WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
